item.description:
this is a benefit for a good friends daughter that was born with acute lymphoblastic leukemia and due to some insurance bull shit they got stuck with some very big hospital bills before the insurance started picking up the tab on treatment. this is in no way really a photo event but im sure they would appreciate it if you took pictures of the event for them and it will be a fun time regardless.

If you are going to go PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE rsvp on facebook if you have a account there

https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=124113387657133&ref=notif&notif_t=event_invite


INFO FROM THE SITE

Hey guys! Come to WHS's 2nd Anuual Rock 4 Show! 

Rock for Rylee is a benefit concert that was created to help the Simmons family. Rylee Simmons is a little girl from Windham, NH that has A.L.L. (acute lymphoblastic leukemia), because her insurance was messed up, the Simmons family was left with paying the first 15 days of chemotherapy. They also have to make frequent trips in and out of Boston for Rylee's dr. visits/chemo etc. 

If you would like more information please contact Alex Gringeri via facebook or email rock4rylee@aol.com

Tickets are $10 advance or at the door 
You can get them on braceletsforrylee.com 
You MUST have your bracelet in order to get into the show (NO EXCEPTIONS) 

BANDS:

MATT RHOADES (of And Then There Were None) 
www.purevolume.com/andthen therewerenone
www.facebook.com/andthenth erewerenone

item.name: A benefit for a very sick little girl
